Articles.Content:
Debate whether MechJeb is cheating. without getting carried away. Luckily you guys probably wouldn't

Here's my side of the argument.

MechJeb isn't cheating, but it does take a lot of the fun out of KSP from my point of few, as in the fun part with making rockets is launching them. And MechJeb kinda ruins that.

Nope. Not getting this argument-starter going again.

Sorry, Clockwork13, but this kind of discussion does nothing but cause trouble. Players may use mods or not, as they see fit.
